{"id":688750021,"lang":"python3","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1651097162,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"114 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/688750021/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"14.5 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def validPalindrome(self, s: str) -> bool:\n        l,r=0,len(s)-1\n        \n        while l<r:\n            if s[l]!=s[r]:\n                skipL,skipR=s[l+1:r+1],s[l:r]\n                return (skipL==skipL[::-1]) or skipR==skipR[::-1]\n            l,r=l+1,r-1\n        return True","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
